title: Reengineering Army Installations: A Systems Approach.
Successful reengineering: Now you know what it isâ€”Here's how to do it!
The reengineering handbook: a step-by-step guide to business transformation
Management and Four Stakeholder Politics
items.abstract: <jats:p> The concept of corporate reengineering provides a rich opportunity to consider certain political implications of using the stakeholder concept. By showing the ethical incoherence of corporate reengineering, as the concept is advocated by Michael Hammer and James Champy, I make the point that the stakeholder concept can be interpreted as a means for advocating just human communities. A new conception of Business & Society as Community Studies is one consequence of this argument. </jats:p>

title: Supporting reengineering using group support systems: A case study
